title: "sitting back with your fancy long range laser"
body:
People saying the funniest shit when they are tilting:

Post game chat after kog complains about Blitz in game; I tell them to position and dodge it will be fine. They choose to play frontline kog for some reason.
kog:  could have hid behind you all game shit vioc 
ME:  lol
ME:  i had the highest kill participation
kog:  see how you like being in front
Kog:  BFD
kog:  you hid
ME:  I couldn't have hid
ME:  I was in the most fights 
Kog:  sitting back with your fancy long range laser (getting range complaints compared to a kog'maw...) while you let teemo and I soak up damage
Kog:  cowardice

Like I'm not even sure why they dragged in teemo. Teemo died the 2nd least next to me. Guessing it was their duo and they wanted to show off.

It's just the "fancy long range laser" makes me laugh so hard when it is told by your own team member who happens to be on Kog'maw.

replies.body:
who the fuck in league has a fancy long range laser? i know lux has like a 1 time one, but other then that, if its a skin? but its his fault, ive played kog twice and even i know to stand back and let me team soak up dmg.
tip:fuck everyone who says shit about you, there is no point in taking these opinions, i suggest you just quit the post game chat

HOW IS THAT A "LONG" LASER,and a castor(mage) should be staying back

IKR

It's what made the situation so funny.

With Viktor's range you have to walk up to use your rotation and then you back off when everything on cd. It's typical trading pattern on any caster. With Viktor's low range (for a caster) I'm on the frontline anytime I need to trade. We didn't have a tank to stand behind b/c it was an aram so you have to position even more.
Look at dat fancy laser coming from Iron Man's severed arm attached to Viktor's shoulder.
